data.message: I need help. My account has some how been changed to some one else. It has all of my information, but some one else name. So every post comes with that name instead of mine. This happened last Thursday, and I don't know how to change it back.

replies.message: Hi there. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can secure it here: http://bit.ly/2cfUF85. -Jessica
I don't think that is what happened. Because the name that is now on my account is my boss. Some how something got changed. It has all of my info and picture, but it shows my name as her
